title: I installed Firefox DeepL Translate add-on. Do I have to be a "Pro" user to use the add-on?
content: I have a 30-day free trial for DeepL add-on (and enabled it in Firefox). I tried to use the extension when I visited a Russian website and clicked DeepL and "Translate this selection" and nothing happened. The webpage wasn't translated. Do I have to be a "Pro" user to use DeepL? If not, how do I get it to work? I'm using Firefox 122.0.1 version and Windows 10.
creator: grov10

title: Firefoxs took 2 minutes on the first start.
content:
Hi,

I am using Firefox Version 122 on Windows 11. For the past month Firefox is slow to start on its first start. It took 2 to 2 1/2 minutes to load up. I have tried ways to fix it but not working. I tried using Google Chrome to test the speed and on the first start and it takes 5 seconds to load up. Therefore, it is not my computer problems. Please help.

Thank You
creator: kingleongc

title: News feed interruptions
content: I don't know. So I've come to you. Thanks.

title: No_Oauth_State: State
content: i am getting a No_Oauth_State: State was not valid when attempting to log into PenFed credit union. MS edge works. Any solutions

title: How can we PERMANENTLY remove old, unused email addresses from autocomplete?
content: The only advice I can find is at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/control-whether-firefox-automatically-fills-forms That advice removes the unwanted email address from the current display, but the unwanted address reappears whenever I return to the page.
creator: leon-arundell

title: Why do the articles dissapear?
content: I have used Pocket, and found it useful, but am infuriated by one issue. If I don't click on a particular selection, I cannot get back to it on Pocket. Why is this? Why can't I get back to the display of Pocket articles when I choose not to follow a particular avenue? This really gets my goat.
creator: mudville
